#Text=Wikinews holds a follow-up interview with Kevin Baugh , president of the Republic of Molossia
#Text=Thursday , May 1 , 2008
#Text=In March , Wikinews reporter Joseph Ford held an exclusive interview with Kevin Baugh , president of the Republic of Molossia , a micronation located near Dayton , Nevada .
#Text=Due to the interest the article gained , both online and off , a follow-up interview was held this week .
#Text=Molossia 's capital city , Espera , is situated on little over an acre of land in Western Nevada , within driving distance of Reno .
#Text=Another territory , Desert Homestead Province , is located in Southern California .
#Text=Unlike most of today 's micronations , Molossia allows visitors and has its own economy .
#Text=It also has its own time zone and holidays as well as a few tourist attractions .
#Text=When asked about the culture of his country Baugh replied , " Molossian culture is a mix of several sources .

#Text=Life here is fairly relaxed and easygoing .

_	_	_	_

#Text=He also said that Molossia and the United States  generally ignore each other " and that there have n't been " any altercations " between the two , despite claiming each other 's land .

column1: #Text=He went on to tell us much more about his tiny nation , which can be read in the interview below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Where is Molossia located ?
#Text=Molossia is located in Western Nevada , about 35 miles southeast of Reno , Nevada .
#Text=How large is Molossia ?
#Text=The portion of Molossia in Western Nevada is about 1.3 acres in size , with another five acres in our other province , Desert Homestead , in Southern California .
#Text=In both cases , the terrain is desert , high desert with sagebrush and pinion trees in Nevada , and low desert with creosote and yucca in California .
#Text=Tell us about your country 's history .
#Text=Molossia was founded in 1977 , when my best friend James and I saw the movie , The Mouse that Roared .
#Text=We were quite taken by the idea of a tiny country accomplishing such amazing and amusing things , and decided to start our own nation .
#Text=James was the King , and I was the Prime Minister .
#Text=Time passed and James moved on , but I stayed with the idea , and carried it along with me everywhere I went until we settled here in Nevada .
#Text=Having actual land really made the dream come alive , and ten years ago I raised the Molossian flag for the first time over our sovereign territory .
#Text=Since then we have worked to build a great , albeit tiny , nation here in the desert .
#Text=We founded the Intermicronational Olympic Games in 2000 , a tradition that has carried on since .
#Text=We started the first Intermicronational Exposition , and also created the Norton Awards for Excellence in Micronationalism .
#Text=That 's just a snap shot of what has been a very interesting decade .
